headline: What the stock market is saying about the housing market
summary: You get a feel for the housing market in a lot of ways. You can look at listings online or in newspapers. You might drive around a neighborhood to check out the houses, the people who live there, and the condition of roads and schools. Sometimes, you get signals from the stock market that make you ...

headline: Lowe’s Q4 Earnings Show Resilience Despite Housing Slump
summary: Lowe’s (NYSE: LOW) closed out FY2025 on a high note, reporting earnings $1.98, which topped analyst expectations of $1.94, and quarterly revenue rising 10.9% year-over-year to $20.58 billion, exceeding analyst estimates of $20.34 billion. Total sales for the quarter were $20.6 billion, compared to $18.6 billion in the prior-year quarter. Comparable sales for the quarter ... Lowe’s Q4 Earnings Show Resilience Despite Housing Slump

headline: Is Affirm (AFRM) Using Lowe’s Partnership To Deepen Moat Or Merely Chase Volume?
summary: In February 2026, Lowe’s announced a partnership with Affirm to offer transparent payment plans, including 0% APR options for eligible shoppers, across its website and mobile app, while also featuring Lowe’s prominently in the Affirm marketplace. This deal deepens Affirm’s presence in large-ticket home improvement spending, potentially increasing transaction volumes by connecting its financing tools to Lowe’s broad customer base. We’ll now examine how integrating Affirm’s plans into Lowe’s...
